casebody.data:
2002-2000 (La. 10/25/02)

SUCCESSION OF Sidney LOUNSBERRY. No. 2002-C-2000. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Lounsberry, Sidney Michael;— Other; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Vermilion, 15th Judicial District Court Div. L, No. 99-73299; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-1664.

Denied.

TRAYLOR, J., would grant the writ. KNOLL, J., would grant the writ.
